pages.text: This crop can be useful in combat, if you hold the RMB for a few seconds, the Mandrake will scream in a radius of 5 blocks which applies the $(#f1c232)Stunned$() effect to nearby entities.$(br2)Harvesting this crop can stun you for a few seconds if you are not protected.

pages.title: Wild Mandrake
pages.text: This wild crop can be found in the Forest and Birch Forest biome.
This food item grants the $(#f1c232)Overfed$() effect for 45 seconds, this prevents saturation from lowering but it reduces your speed by 10%.
